name: God Kings
summary: IT’S TIME TO BECOME THE WORLD’S GREATEST KING!! Compete on the ultimate battleground against epic monsters and tyrannical enemy kings in the vast 3D world of God Kings! Raise an eternal empire and build an army, the likes of which have never been seen! Your strategy, your victory! Summon legendary Guardians and unleash devastating damage upon all those who stand opposed! Join forces with other strong kingdoms and grow your influence on the battlefield together!
